name: Slider Road
description:
Tap with the correct timing to stop the moving pillars and create a new road.
Your car will drive up the new track automatically. Don’t make the road too steep or your car will flip and crash!

On your endless highway trip, there will be other dangers to look out for. Pillars get faster and faster, and go higher and higher. Don’t forget to build that road, otherwise you’ll crash down.

For the expert bridge constructors, you can try to build your track to collect the coins floating in the air. If you build correctly, you will get the coins. But avoid the bombs if you don’t want to go boom!
